meta.title: VIGOR Memberclient
meta.keywords: vig, vigor, eosdac, member, eos, dac, token, custodian, blockchain, crypto, decentralized, autonomous
meta.noscript: To view this webpage you need to have javascript enabled

index.description_p1: VIGOR stablecoin defi platform is a decentralized autonomous community which means it is owned and operated by the token holders who agree to the constitution and register as members of the community.
index.description_p2: Join us by signing the constitution and ask us on telegram for a VIG token for staking as a candidate. Then you can build and market your profile; the top candidates by vote become custodians and can receive a voter token and ability to claim VIG tokens.

verify_token.copied_to_clipboard: Copied the token to your clipboard!
verify_token.description: You've been redirected to this page to pair an eos account with a discord id. Please sign the message and go back to the discord bot. Run the command $verify.
verify_token.title: Verify token
